New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the fastest goal from the start (7 seconds)
Germany secured a 2-0 victory over France in a friendly match ahead of the Euros
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz’s early goal after Toni Kroos’ vertical pass
Germany's two first-half goals by Florian Wirtz and Jamal Musiala, with Kai Havertz scoring the second
Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps’ 150th match as France manager
France’s preparation for the European Championships
Post-Match Reflections: Aurélien Tchouaméni acknowledged France’s lack of performance and intensity
Brice Samba’s solid performance in goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: France’s struggles with possession and technical errors
The match being a friendly ahead of the Euros
Others: The match was an international friendly
